main event: An observer noted a bright light in the sky over Middletown, Ohio, for 7-8 minutes on June 66, 20/02/65.
interesting points: The object appeared to be about 20 times brighter than a star., The observer noted variable movement of the object, including stopping and changing directions., The object changed color from white to two small red dots., The sighting lasted between 7 to 8 minutes., The observer described the object as having a rear guard.
